titles.title: Land Between the Rivers Southern Illinois National Heritage Area Act of 2006
A bill to establish the Land Between the Rivers National Heritage Area in the State of Illinois, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 5/23/2006--Introduced. Land Between the Rivers Southern Illinois National Heritage Area Act of 2006 - Establishes the Land Between the Rivers National Heritage Area in Illinois. Designates the Southern Illinois University Carbondale as the management entity for the Area.
